column4: I have another Linux distro on the first partition of the first drive (sda1), and I am making room for Ubuntu, and the only choice I have is for the Ubuntu partition to be on sda2. Can Ubuntu boot from sda2 when the first partition has the "boot" flag?
just make sure wherever grub is looking is configured right
ok so then my tip is to install the 32 bit programs and then launch them
